tool_description: Monitors current inventory levels against reorder points and generates alerts for products requiring replenishment or experiencing unusual stock movements.

product_ids.description: Products to monitor stock levels for

reorder_points.description: Reorder point quantities for each product

alert_threshold.description: Alert when stock falls below this multiple of reorder point

include_forecasted_depletion.description: Include projected stock depletion dates in monitoring

error_messages: Array length mismatch: product_ids and reorder_points must have the same length.
Invalid alert threshold: alert_threshold must be greater than 0.
Product not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in inventory system.
Invalid reorder points: All reorder_points must be non-negative.
usage: Provide products with their reorder points to monitor stock levels. Adjust alert_threshold to get earlier warnings, and enable include_forecasted_depletion for predictive alerts.

current_stock_levels.description: Current stock quantities for monitored products

days_until_stockout.description: Estimated days until stockout for each product
